I just moved from JUnit 3.2 to JUnit 3.8.1.

There used to be a "Show Test Browser" menu item in 
junit.swingui.TestRunner that would allow you to run a single test 
method in a test case.

That menu item is gone in 3.8.1.  It there a way to run a single test 
method now?

I see that the "Test Hierarchy" panel fills in with all the test 
methods when a test case is run, and then at that point a single test 
method can be run, but I can't find how to run a single test method 
before the entire test case is run.

Thanks.
Jim Begley
